data.lyric:
[ti:Hawai Hawai]
[ar:Monali Thakur/Jeet Gannguli/Dev Negi]
[al:Best of Srabanti Chatterjee]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:01.06]Hawai Hawai - Monali Thakur/Jeet Gannguli/Dev Negi
[00:03.82]Dev Negi/Monali Thakur：
[00:21.73]Tor preme porechi
[00:23.41]Shudhu toke cheyeche
[00:24.96]Toke chara laage na ei mon
[00:28.32]Debo naki dhar baaki
[00:29.86]Mon aaj shahoshi
[00:31.71]Aye tui kache amar shun
[00:34.23]Dev Negi/Monali Thakur：
[00:34.68]Dil-e aaj feeling tor
[00:36.60]Ei dil mange more
[00:38.16]Perfect ami tor bemishal
[00:41.59]Khela ato shoja noy
[00:43.08]Ato ami boka noy
[00:44.72]Chyere tui thakte parbi na
[00:47.89]Dev Negi/Monali Thakur：
[00:50.76]Hawai hawai tu ho ja meri
[00:53.90]Hawai hawai tu ho ja meri
[00:57.30]Hawai hawai tu ho ja meri jaane jaan
[01:03.69]Hawai hawai tu ho ja meri
[01:07.01]Hawai hawai tu ho ja meri
[01:10.37]Hawai hawai tu ho ja meri jaane jaan
[01:17.06]Dev Negi/Monali Thakur：
[01:30.15]Emotion-e diler tor moner chowate
[01:33.77]Ventilator aj mon
[01:36.79]Are obhiman tor joto jome ache
[01:40.38]Shunbo na kono baron
[01:42.97]Dev Negi/Monali Thakur：
[01:44.00]Dil-e aaj feeling tor
[01:45.55]Ei dil mange more
[01:47.33]Perfect ami tor bemishal
[01:50.70]Khela ato shoja noy
[01:52.27]Ato ami boka noy
[01:53.68]Chyere tui thakte parbi na
[01:57.18]Dev Negi：
[01:59.78]Hawai hawai tu ho ja meri
[02:02.81]Hawai hawai tu ho ja meri
[02:06.25]Hawai hawai tu ho ja meri jaane jaan
[02:13.03]Dev Negi/Monali Thakur：
[02:26.07]Are dhuk-puk e hridoye
[02:27.89]Rating e mon
[02:29.82]Kor na receive premer phone
[02:32.64]Ore joto pota
[02:33.92]Potbo na na re boka
[02:36.16]Debo na dhora ekhon
[02:39.07]Dev Negi/Monali Thakur：
[02:39.83]Dil-e aaj feeling tor
[02:41.50]Ei dil mange more
[02:42.92]Perfect ami tor bemishal
[02:46.46]Khela ato shoja noy
[02:47.89]Ato ami boka noy
[02:49.66]Chyere tui thakte parbi na
[02:55.75]Hawai hawai tu ho ja meri
[02:58.72]Hawai hawai tu ho ja meri
[03:02.08]Hawai hawai tu ho ja meri jaane jaan
[03:08.78]Hawai hawai tu ho ja meri
[03:11.91]Hawai hawai tu ho ja meri
[03:15.12]Hawai hawai tu ho ja meri jaane jaan
data.trans:
[ti:Hawai Hawai]
[ar:Monali Thakur/Jeet Gannguli/Dev Negi]
[al:Best of Srabanti Chatterjee]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:01.06]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.82]//
[00:21.73]我坠入了你的爱河
[00:23.41]只在乎你一个
[00:24.96]没有你 就感觉自己成了行尸走肉
[00:28.32]我的余生 我会赠与你 或者借给你
[00:29.86]现在我满腔孤勇
[00:31.71]来听我说
[00:34.23]//
[00:34.68]为你悸动
[00:36.60]这就是我的心
[00:38.16]我是你命定的完美恋人
[00:41.59]爱情游戏并非简简单单
[00:43.08]我不是真的愚笨
[00:44.72]我只是不能表现得太过明显
[00:47.89]//
[00:50.76]你过得怎样
[00:53.90]你过得怎样
[00:57.30]你就在那里 我了解我的命运
[01:03.69]你过得怎样
[01:07.01]你过得怎样
[01:10.37]你就在那里 我了解我的命运
[01:17.06]//
[01:30.15]在你爱的抚摸下 在幸福的情感中
[01:33.77]现在我如沐春风
[01:36.79]你自尊心很强
[01:40.38]我不会听从任何命令式的话语
[01:42.97]//
[01:44.00]为你悸动
[01:45.55]这就是我的心
[01:47.33]我是你命定的完美恋人
[01:50.70]爱情游戏并非简简单单
[01:52.27]我不是真的愚笨
[01:53.68]我只是不能表现得太过明显
[01:57.18]//
[01:59.78]你过得怎样
[02:02.81]你过得怎样
[02:06.25]你就在那里 我了解我的命运
[02:13.03]//
[02:26.07]在心中
[02:27.89]爱意翻涌
[02:29.82]没有接到爱的联络
[02:32.64]他就像许多孩子一样
[02:33.92]天真烂漫的傻子
[02:36.16]现在我不会再放弃
[02:39.07]//
[02:39.83]为你悸动
[02:41.50]这就是我的心
[02:42.92]我是你命定的完美恋人
[02:46.46]爱情游戏并非简简单单
[02:47.89]我不是真的愚笨
[02:49.66]我只是不能表现得太过明显
[02:55.75]你过得怎样
[02:58.72]你过得怎样
[03:02.08]你就在那里 我了解我的命运
[03:08.78]你过得怎样
[03:11.91]你过得怎样
[03:15.12]你就在那里 我了解我的命运
